channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22101|2024-08-03T03:00:55.247Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Denial of service in multimedia due to uncontrolled resource consumption while parsing an incoming HAB message in Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22100|2024-08-03T03:00:55.268Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia due to improper check on received export descriptors in Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22099|2024-08-03T03:00:55.367Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia due to improper validation of array index in Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22103|2024-08-03T03:00:55.249Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia driver due to double free while processing data from user in Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22098|2024-08-03T03:00:55.212Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia driver due to untrusted pointer dereference while reading data from socket in Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22106|2024-08-03T03:00:55.353Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia due to improper length check while copying the data in Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22102|2024-08-03T03:00:55.248Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia due to incorrect type conversion while adding data in Snapdragon Auto

item.title: CVE-2022-22104|2024-08-03T03:00:55.371Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto
item.description: Memory corruption in multimedia due to improper check on the messages received. in Snapdragon Auto
